headline: With Their Needle-Moving Acquisitions Now Closed, These 2 Top Oil Stocks Look Like Great Buys for 2025
summary: Several oil companies secured needle-moving acquisitions, including ConocoPhillips (NYSE: COP) and Devon Energy (NYSE: DVN).  ConocoPhillips completed its acquisition of Marathon Oil in late November.  "This acquisition of Marathon Oil is a perfect fit for ConocoPhillips," stated CEO Ryan Lance in the press release announcing the deal's completion.
